title: New Warring Kingdoms skin ideas
body:
{{champion:4}} 
TF is better to fit with the "Zhuge Liang" skin, also his W the cards may swap to the the five elements command plate(metal, wood, water, fire and earthï¼‰. "Zhuge Liang" is the best adviser and general during the warring kingdoms history his famous parts is leading his army to attack some other place that he will be obliged to relieve during the war. and that is what TF's ult. Please think about it.

replies.body: you could make house of flying daggers Katarina, I would pay for that

I was thinking (even though he only just got another skin) a Lunar Revel Varus skin would be cool...his ultimate will have something like the new arrow guy from OverWatch, where he chucks out two spiralling dragons like, Dragonblade Varus or Dragon Archer Varus???

I dunno...

(btw new Japanese archer guy from OverWatch is basically Yasuo with a bow and arrow...)
the only problem is that tf doesnt have a kingdom
